Title: Chargeasap's Zeus is the ultimate 280W GaN charger

Title: 3 years in, Sandy Hook families still wait to collect what Alex Jones owes them
Description: The Infowars founder declared bankruptcy after families sued him for defamation and won more than a billion dollars in damages, but Jones has yet to pay them a dime.

Title: 'No more floppy disks': Air traffic control overhaul faces some daunting obstacles

The fragile state of the U.S.
air traffic control system was easy to see during the recent outages in Newark.
But it will be a lot harder to make up for decades of underinvestment and other mistakes.
